column4: using samba? on the ubuntu machine do: sudo smbpasswd -a <user>      and create a samba password, then try from the window's machine
what goes in for <user> the ubuntu username or some arbitrary?
whatever username you are using on the ubuntu machine, i think it may have to be a current user
security reasons i suppose, you could turn it off, but im kinda lazy to go through explaining it lol
